## [palaeoverse](http://palaeoverse.palaeoverse.org)

<a href="https://doi.org/10.31223/X5Z94Q"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/DOI-10.31223%2FX5Z94Q-blue"></a>
<a href="https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=palaeoverse"><img src="https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/palaeoverse"></a>
<a href="https://cran.r-project.org/package=palaeoverse"><img src="https://cranlogs.r-pkg.org/badges/grand-total/palaeoverse"></a>

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-3}

![](images/logo-palaeoverse.png){width=100%}


:::

::: {.g-col-9}

The palaeoverse R package is a community-driven toolkit to support the preparation and exploration of palaeobiological data. The package provides a suite of auxiliary functions, is open-source, and freely available from the <span style="color: #ed4d7e"><a href="https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/palaeoverse/index.html" style="text-decoration: none;">CRAN</a></span>. palaeoverse has three core principles: (1) streamline data preparation and exploration; (2) enhance code readability; and (3) improve reproducibility of results. It is my hope that over time, palaeoverse will be adopted and developed by the community, with contributors and users from across the globe.

:::

:::

## [rphylopic](http://rphylopic.palaeoverse.org)
<a href="https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=rphylopic"><img src="https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/rphylopic"></a>
<a href="https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=rphylopic"><img src="https://cranlogs.r-pkg.org/badges/grand-total/rphylopic"></a>

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-3}

![](images/logo-rphylopic.png){width=100%}


:::

::: {.g-col-9}

The rphylopic R package allows users to add silhouettes of organisms from the <span style="color: #ed4d7e"><a href="http://phylopic.org/" target="_blank" style="text-decoration: none;">PhyloPic website</a></span> to plots generated in base R and ggplot2. The package was originally developed and maintained by <span style="color: #ed4d7e"><a href="https://scottchamberlain.info/" target="_blank" style="text-decoration: none;">Scott Chamberlain</a></span>.
From ver. 1.0.0, the package is now developed and maintained by myself and <span style="color: #ed4d7e"><a href="https://williamgearty.com" target="_blank" style="text-decoration: none;">William Gearty</a></a></span>
from the <span style="color: #ed4d7e"><a href="https://palaeoverse.org/" target="_blank" style="text-decoration: none;">Palaeoverse</a></span> team. The package is open-source, and freely available from the <span style="color: #ed4d7e"><a href="https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/rphylopic/index.html" style="text-decoration: none;">CRAN</a></span>.

:::

:::

## [rmacrostrat](http://rmacrostrat.palaeoverse.org)  
<a href="https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.13143096"><img src="https://zenodo.org/badge/DOI/10.5281/zenodo.13143096.svg" alt="DOI"></a>
<a href="https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=rmacrostrat"><img src="https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/rmacrostrat"></a>
<a href="https://cran.r-project.org/package=rmacrostrat"><img src="https://cranlogs.r-pkg.org/badges/grand-total/rmacrostrat"></a>

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-3}

![](images/logo-rmacrostrat.png){width=100%}


:::

::: {.g-col-9}

The rmacrostrat R package allows users to interfaces with the [Macrostrat](https://macrostrat.org){target="_blank"} database to access and retrieve a variety of geological, palaeontological, and economic data directly to the R environment. The package provides straightforward functionality for accessing and retrieving a variety of geological, paleontological, and economic data hosted by Macrostrat. The package is open-source, and freely available from the <span style="color: #ed4d7e"><a href="https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/rmacrostrat/index.html" style="text-decoration: none;">CRAN</a></span>.

:::

:::

## [sepkoski](http://sepkoski.palaeoverse.org)

<a href="https://zenodo.org/badge/latestdoi/564230284"><img src="https://zenodo.org/badge/564230284.svg"></a>
<a href="https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=sepkoski"><img src="https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/sepkoski"></a>
<a href="https://cran.r-project.org/package=sepkoski"><img src="https://cranlogs.r-pkg.org/badges/grand-total/sepkoski"></a>

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-3}

![](images/logo-sepkoski.png){width=100%}


:::

::: {.g-col-9}

The sepkoski R package is a light and easy solution to access Sepkoski's fossil marine animal genera compendium. The package provides access to the raw dataset, a dataset with intervals standardised to the International Geological Time Scale, and plotting functionality for reproducing Sepkoski's Phanerozoic curve. The package is open-source, and freely available from the <span style="color: #ed4d7e"><a href="https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/sepkoski/index.html" style="text-decoration: none;">CRAN</a></span>.

:::

:::
